(flying [flying], flies-in-storms [stormimmune])

item slots [slots]: 2 hands, head, body, feet, 2 misc
After the return of the Raptor clan the Spire Horn Caelians have been replaced as a warrior caste by the Raptors, but there are still many who chose a martial life. The Spire Horn Caelians are able to fly during storms and have partial resistance to cold and lightning.
